title: [Large-scale] Formative Assessment Integration Strategy Design for Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core Pedagogical Theories and Understanding of Classroom Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Program emphasizing effective integration of formative assessment in teacher training, enhancing preservice teachers' reflective practices and instructional design skills.

learning_goals: Learners can understand the core principles of formative assessment and design evaluation tools applicable to real classroom contexts.
Student-teachers can analyze lesson execution processes and derive improvement strategies through self-assessment and peer evaluation activities.
In project-based assessments, learners can diagnose achievement levels and establish feedback systems by utilizing formative assessment strategies.

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
